title: Lichdom.Battlemage.Update.v2014.08.27.65558.Hotfix-FLTDOX
description:
Lichdom.Battlemage.Update.v2014.08.27.65558.Hotfix-FLTDOX






FairLight DOX Division Presents:

Lichdom: Battlemage *HOTFIX 2014.08.27.65558*
(c) Xaviant:
Cracked by: FAiRLiGHT:
Release Date: 28-08-14:
Packaged by: FAiRLiGHT
# of Options: N/A
Type: Patch
Number of archives: x

Update Notes:

Changes made to the game code to address various crash issues:

Rare crashes while crafting and/or leaving the inventory
screens up for an extended period
Sporadic crashes on level load/unload
Sporadic crashes in normal gameplay

Instructions:

* Unpack the update and run flt-libahf.exe
* Select the folder of your installation and click 'install'
* Wait for the patching to finish
* Play the game

/TEAM FAIRLIGHT

Kindest regards - FairLight DOX 2014
